original_text: They will no longer trust their idols to help them. They made altars for themselves, where they worshipped their gods. They worshipped Asherah at special poles. They made altars where they burned incense. But they will not do those things any more.
korean_text: 자기 손으로 만든 제단을 바라보지 아니하며 자기 손가락으로 지은 아세라나 태양상을 보지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will no longer trust their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 그들의 우상을 신뢰하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They worshipped Asherah at special poles
But they will not do those things any more
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 더 이상 그런 일들을 하지 않을 것이다
